quote: If I cannot do great things. I can do small things in a great way. – Martin Luther King, Jr.
fact: One of the reasons marijuana is illegal today is because cotton growers in the 1930s lobbied against hemp farmers they saw it as competition.
joke: Did you hear the one about the giant pickle?  He was kind of a big dill.
